SummaryEnglish: A science-fiction drama adapted from the novel of the same name by the famous science fiction writer Liu Cixin. “Three-Body Problem” tells the story of nanomaterials scientist Wang Miao and criminal police Shi Qiang who jointly unveiled the mystery of the “Three-Body Problem” world of an extraterrestrial civilization.

1.SummaryEnglish: The "Guzheng" plan was implemented in the Panama Canal, and ETO Evans died; the Trisolarans used sophons to interfere with scientific experiments on earth; Mozi received an order to kill Luo Ji.

2.SummaryEnglish: The high-energy particle collision experiment failed due to the interference of the Trisolaran sophons. Ding Yi forced the collider to overclock, but the experiment still failed. Human science was declared dead; Shi Qiang led Luo Ji to avoid ETO pursuit and go to an unknown location.

3.SummaryEnglish: Human science was locked up by sophons, and they took advantage of sophons' inability to monitor human thinking and launched the "Wallfacer" project; the remnants of ETO began to gather; Frederick Taylor, Bill Shines, Manuel Reddia Now, Luo Ji and the four of them came to Verne Island, the PDC headquarters.

4.SummaryEnglish: Luo Ji was announced as one of the four "Wallfacers" at the United Nations General Assembly. After publicly stating that he rejected all the rights and missions of the Wallfacers, he fled the meeting, but found himself at the "Forging Swords into Plowshares" statue in the General Assembly Square. He was assassinated by an ETO assassin before.

8.SummaryEnglish: Our heroes face critical decisions and intense challenges, highlighting the utmost importance of their actions in the unfolding narrative.

9.SummaryEnglish: Let's explore cosmic themes through a fantastical lens, weaving together elements of science fiction and mythology to create a captivating story.

10.SummaryEnglish: The ETO base is destroyed, and the fireflies meet a tragic end.

11.SummaryEnglish: The characters explore the mysterious tomb of the brown ants, uncovering secrets that challenge their understanding of the universe.

12.SummaryEnglish: Elements converge, revealing fundamental truths about the cosmic landscape and its implications for humanity.

13.SummaryEnglish: Mysterious cosmic phenomena unfold, challenging the characters' perception of the universe and its profound implications
